website_summaries.verdict: Convenient handles and lightweight materials make these bags easy for everyone to use.
pros: Conveniently placed handles make the bags easy to hold
Bags come with participation medals to hand out after the race
17 x 34 inch bags come in a pack of 4
cons: Bags sit at a slightly higher price point

customer_reviews.title: great buy for anyone professional caretakers to families throwing a party!
customer_reviews.text: The potato sacks are great, i am an entertainer and use them pretty often. for adults it goes over the legs to about the hip and for little little kids it goes to under the armpit which is perfect. the bottom kind of flattens a bit so it is easy to identify where the base is which is a big issue for the children using the burlap sacks. the colors dont really fade because of the parachute type material. For the same price i also got 6 burlap sacks and i regret not getting this first because it really is worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Caramelo

customer_reviews.title: Good quality - large enough for adults
customer_reviews.text: These are big enough for adults but children fit in them just fine. Seems to be great quality. Bought for an event, but these are a good thing to keep in the "Mom, I'm bored!" closet.
customer_reviews.author: Jg5

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PRODUCT! GREAT FUN!
customer_reviews.text: The birthday party was for a small 6 year old so the handles were not used to hold, the smaller guys put their arms thru so it gave it the suspender effect and they seemed to do better that way with more control! They were a HUGE HIT and the boys loved them! GREAT quality, they will be used over and over, I have SIX Grandsons!
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy and fun!
customer_reviews.text: These sacks are very sturdy! I bought them for my son's 5th birthday and only anticipated the children wanting to participate in the race. However, the sacks were so great that the adults joined the fun and they still look new. They were used so many times and they did not rip, tear, or have any damage to them. I recommend these sacks for purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy, for both children and adults!
customer_reviews.text: Solid bags - tested by both children and adults - good quality and design. Shipment arrived a day earlier, and it did go overseas so that was a nice surprise too. Would definitely recommend both seller and product!
customer_reviews.author: Annabel

customer_reviews.title: Super excited about this one
customer_reviews.text: Super excited about this one! My son and nephews are going to have so much fun. The material is sturdy I checked it and the quality is very good. Definitely will be buying more things like this for the kids to play outdoors.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie Gomez

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: It was delivered promptly in good condition. Hope it will last as i run an outfit that does games for children parties and get together
customer_reviews.author: FunLola Afolabi

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and fun!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic product! The bags held up to teenagers jumping through the field games and the cheap medals included added to the silly fun! Here's a suggestion for improved product - add rubber treads on the bottom to prevent slippage. i know falling is the part of the fun but in this litigious wold we live in it might be worth it.
customer_reviews.author: MJ

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: Set provided hours of backyard family fun for children and adults. Bags are thick and durable; supported the weight and height of a generous sized 6’2” male.

customer_reviews.title: Fun bags
customer_reviews.text: Great, sturdy product. Fits bigger kids best.. 5/6 and up, but my 4 year old could manage by putting his arms though handles

customer_reviews.text: These are great. Very sturdy and good quality. Work for adults or kids. Was afraid they were going to be small but they are a good size!

product_meta.title: Outdoor Lawn Games Potato Sack Race Bags for Kids and Adults, with Egg and Spoon Race Games, 3-Legged Race Bands, Game Prizes, Outside Backyard Field Day Birthday Party Games for Kids and Family
feature_bullets: FIT FOR ADULTS AND KIDS - 24 Pcs yard games for any occasion and for kids of all ages. 4 Potato Sack Race Bags size 34" x 17", big and large enough for adults. 4Pcs 3 legged race bands are fun for adults and kids to play, learn to work as team to win the race. 4 pack Egg and Spoon Race Game is very good for training your balance system in our brain. 12 game prizes used to reward the kids who win the games.

WELL MADE SACK RACE BAGS- Durable oxford cloth and double bottom, sturdy and well made. That are strong enough to withstand this vigorous game. Exquisite workmanship with fine stitch sewing. Featuring bright color, odorless and environmental protection.

GOOD QUALITY, SAFETY- 3 Legged Race Bands made of high quality nylon and velcro tape, easy to put on and very sturdy, will not break during the race game. The Egg and Spoon Race Game non-toxic and odorless. Your child’s safety is important to us.The lawn games Set is BPA-Safe, Lead-Safe and Phthalates-Safe.

A PERFECT OUTDOOR GAMES-This is a great fun game that everyone can get involved with from the racers on the field to the spectators cheering on from the side.The outside games Great for carnival themed birthday party games, BBQS, picnics, family reunions and field day events.
REFUND GUARANTEE - You can rest assured to buy, if you are not fully satisfied with our backyard games set, we will full refund.
